name: Lucid Dream (2020)
description:
Lucid Dream is Point and Click horror game.

You dream of being trapped in a strange place even though you fell asleep as always.

It was a laboratory where bad experiments took place.

Things that you can't understand happen in this place

The last scientists and subjects left a note about what was about to happen before the laboratory was shut down.

You can pick up notes and some items from anywhere in this place.

Some doors and ways are locked or hidden.

Use Items to move forward and find out what happened at this lab.

Escape and wake up from your dream!
